mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (iboard, bcode, iuser, title, content,gNo) VALUES ((SELECT NEXTVAL(iboard_seq)),#{bcode},#{iuser},#{title},#{content},(SELECT LASTVAL(iboard_seq)))
mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.iuser, A.bcode, A.title, A.gNo, A.gOrd, A.gLayer, A.regdate, B.unm as writer FROM t_board as A LEFT JOIN t_user as B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.bcode = #{bcode} ORDER BY A.gNo desc, gOrd asc
SELECT A.*, B.unm as writer FROM t_board as A LEFT JOIN t_user as B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard}
